name: Asteroids CTRL+PLAY
description:
A game made as an example during a programming and Game Maker class for teenagers (from 12 - 16 years old) at CTRL+PLAY school, a brazilian programming and robotics school for kids and teenagers where I teach.

This game is based on the classic Asteroids and its purpose is to teach and demonstrate what can be done with Game Maker Studio.

Enjoy this modified classic with 3 diferent and fun power ups!

Thanks for playing!
